title: The [Not] Cursed Dragon
description: I am a dragon who hates dragons.The dragons murdered my family. The dragons stole me. The fae purchased me. My mates saved me.My mates imprisoned me.They think they're keeping me safe. They think they know what I need. What all delicate, feminine, gold dragons need. A comfortable den. A well-stocked pantry. Twenty children.That's not what this gold dragon needs. This gold dragon needs blood. This gold dragon needs revenge.The (Not) Cursed Dragon is book one of the Deadly Dragons Duet. It is a slow burn, reverse harem romance for readers 18+TW: Flashbacks of abuse
author: Colette Rhodes
